args: Does this describe a specific, new, official action or formal announcement already taken/made by the Trump administration? Answer only "yes" or "no". President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Monday requiring the federal government to return to... President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Monday requiring the federal government to return to the use of plastic straws and away from paper straws. “We’re going back to plastic straws. These things don’t work,” Trump said from the Oval Office. “I’ve had them many times, and on occasion, they break, they explode.”
result: No. This appears to be a satirical or fictional account, not an actual executive order that was signed. While the text suggests it describes an official action, there is no evidence this specific executive order about plastic straws was real.
